name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension Disabler for Localhost and websites

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to manage and disable extensions on specific websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a tool to help manage and disable extensions for specific websites. Really helpful for disabling password managers or language learning tools. 
I personally use it for disabling them while developing websites. 
Useful for disabling apps that bother with popups in important websites.
